TextBlock.Text: SOLA: Hopeful Shadow can't support life like this, its too fragile. How long can we keep up the lie?
YULE: I'm aware. But what can we do? we've run out of materials to add any more supports.
SOLA: I have no more ideas; maybe our friends back on Gearhaven have found something.
YULE: I hope so. Jai and Kazi are our best bet.
